meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>supplement</kanji> of <kanji>help</kanji> is an <vocabulary>aid</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>help</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>assistance</vocabulary>. Not a full on help, but an aid of sorts.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
